title: teemo the little shit
body: This is on behalf of the league community, I know you all agree except for that 1% of delusional, uneducated swine's that are a lvl 7 the sweats, well, its not hard with he's ridiculous one shotting Q and stupid mushrooms that are supposed to make me invincible like the ones I shelved the other night with the boys. so what im trying to say is please riot just piss the little fucker off, no one actually enjoys playing him.

replies.body:
One shotting Q??? do you not build MR???

Teemo isn't a problem, you just need to know the counter.

Sweeper/Oracles Elixer (if you're on ARAM)
Spirit Visage/Adaptive Helm

No more problems lmao

**I don't actually play teemo, i'm barely mastery 1 #thanksARAM**
I didn't choose the bronze life, the bronze life chose me.
yeah nah I was bored at school and bullshittted some stuff xD  {{champion:17}}
